item.description:
TORG: Roleplaying the Possibility Wars is a fast paced and fun pulp-action game that mixes characters from half a dozen different pulp action and adventure genres into one pulse pounding excitement filled game. The "Drama Deck" is a unique mechanic that people still talk about and no other game has duplicated.

The Lost Armory is an introductory adventure designed both to be fun and introduce new players to the TORG mechanics.

We will run Part 1 at this meetup. Depending on how people feel about the game we will also schedule when we want to run part 2.
item.how_to_find_us: You'll find Jeb. Its his place.
item.why: This is an introductory adventure designed for people new to TORG. If your at all curious, or even never heard of TORG, then come and learn what makes this game and its system unique in the history of roleplay games.
item.name: METRO WEST: The Lost Armory (TORG)
